description: A rocky trail shared by horses folks. About 1400' of gain and roughly 10 miles long with some good climbs half of which is on jeep roads. Great vistas but watch out for horse traffic.
directions: The trail head is located at the Skull-Hollow Camp ground about 5 miles east of Smithrocks State Park in Central Oregon near the city of Terrebonne.
title: Grey Butte Loop
